messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Summer is nearly over
messages.msgSnippet: ** Hey, when this conference is over, can I rent you for a while?  I ve been dreaming of finishing painting my living room and kitchen every since I broke my
messages.messageBody:
**
Hey, when this conference is over, can I rent you for a while? I've been
dreaming of finishing painting my living room and kitchen every since I
broke my
ankle last year (has it really been almost a year?). **

I wanted to tease Kelly that if she leads us to believe she has
superhuman powers, then we are going to want TWO conferences EVERY year
until ALL our kids are grown. ::::: ducking, running, and going back
to resting on the couch like a tuber :::::

Betsy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Summer is nearly over
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hey, when this conference is over, can I rent you for a while?  I ve been dreaming of finishing painting my living room and kitchen every since I broke my
messages.messageBody:
> tiled my kitchen counters, finished wallpapering and painted the kitchen
> cabinets again, put in a wood floor and a new sink & fixtures in the
> kitchen,
> put in new counters with sinks and fixtures in the bathrooms, pulled out all
>
> the tile, tub, and toilet in the boys' bathroom, installed a new tub and
> walls--but haven't tiles those walls or the floor yet.

Hey, when this conference is over, can I rent you for a while? I've been
dreaming of finishing painting my living room and kitchen every since I broke my
ankle last year (has it really been almost a year?). Fell down the stairs
with two walls done in each room. I've had vague plans to tile my bathroom
floor for a long time and even bought a book at home depot. Maybe now that I"m in
the second trimester, I'll actually get some of this stuff done.

I'm so impressed to know you! I'm always more productive in the fall,
though. I think it's heat related thing. But I can't wait for school to start and
all our favorite hang outs to thin out...

Elizabeth


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Summer is nearly over
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/20/2003 12:41:46 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Sorry--it s just you!  I ve tiled my kitchen counters, finished wallpapering and
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/20/2003 12:41:46 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

> Do any of you still struggle with this at all? What has helped you to
> get past this -- or is it just me? lol

Sorry--it's just you! <BWG>

I've tiled my kitchen counters, finished wallpapering and painted the kitchen
cabinets again, put in a wood floor and a new sink & fixtures in the kitchen,
put in new counters with sinks and fixtures in the bathrooms, pulled out all
the tile, tub, and toilet in the boys' bathroom, installed a new tub and
walls--but haven't tiles those walls or the floor yet. I have the best garden I've
ever had (a LOT of composting)----flowers and fruits and vegies! I've had the
outside of the house painted (they finish tomorrow). Oh--and the conference! <
G>

It's been a BUSY summer! <BWG>

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
